divs: sighting detailsi had an arguement with my mom late at night. i decided to let my frustration out on some weights and began to do a few sets of bench in the garage. after 2 sets i sparked up a cigarette and walked out of my garage and towards the edge of my side walk. i just happen to glance east and it stuck out like a sore thumb. 3 orange balls making triangle shape was moving across the sky from north to south-southeast. the lights were not normal. the orange balls\lights had zero shimmer. it was silent. i could tell it had a triangle shape from its silloute. from my perspective, the size was about the same as the moon on a full moon night. as it moved, i heard absolutely nothing. i've been to plenty of airshows and understand how fast jets are and how quickly they move accross the sky. this thing was cruising and i wouldn't be able to estimate how far it traveled in 8 seconds. i was just waiting for sound and heard nothing. at the end of the 8 seconds it disapearred before getting obstructed by other trees or houses in my neighborhood. 1 second after disapearing, i saw a shooting star from approx the same spot it had vanished from. (my theory on this- 1. shooting star by chance in the same area 2. it flew directly away from me and i saw it follow the curve of the planet at some crazy speed which made it look like a shooting star.. coolest thing that i'll probably never see again! here's the kicker.. about two weeks later saw a show on the "aurora" (discovery).. about 5 years after the sighting, i saw the "belguim ufo" on the internet. i can confirm, the belgium video is the exact craft i saw.. i will provide a link to the vid.. http:\\video.google.com\videosearch?hl=en&q=belguim%20ufo&um=1&ie=utf-8&sa=n&tab=wv# 1st video- the triagle of lights were exactly the same as i saw..
